text: In this @katiedjennings piece I’m quoted about how asymptomatic or mild breakthrough #COVID19 infections aren’t evidence of vaccine failure but of vaccine success as it aborts infection from causing disease https://t.co/nopc0wRB8o

“We have had already 2 coronavirus pandemics come out of China & it’s more likely than not will that we will have another coronavirus pandemic come out of China, so [a China-based probe] is our best chance to get our hands around how this gets out of bats” https://t.co/bmzQaCRVgz

I meant tame. As more people at high hospitalization risk are vaccinated (as they are in many states) cases decouple from hospitalization & #COVID19 looks more like other respiratory viruses dealt w/ yr in & yr out. There’llalways be baseline cases, hospitalizations, & deaths

Breakthru #COVID19 “infections” are expected. Vaccines aren’t bug zappers. Some low level infection is likely to occur alerting immune system of intruder. These “infections” are mostly non-productive, aborted, & medically insignificant. Stop testing the asymptomatic vaccinated!
